title: Balancing Blocks — FS Objects
description: Have fun balancing these faceted, stone-size shapes to create your own sculpture. Available in a variety of colors, including Ocean and Desert.
cleaned_text: Balancing Blocks Balancing Blocks $55.00 Have fun balancing these faceted, stone-size shapes to create unique combinations and sculptures. Each set includes ten solid oak blocks, tumbled in a water-based, non-toxic paint, and packaged in a cotton drawstring bag. Available in a four colorways. 6 x 2 x 1.5 in.
